div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 963 Nova Zagora, Bulgaria, 1943 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 24 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 7 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 3 spread-flan tetradr. Imit. Thasos: 12 tetradr. Athens: 2 New Style tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 15 (1946), p. 242
